text.div:
BCI BreastCancerMStageVS ValueSet

Metastasis category according to AJCC breast cancer staging recommendations.

name: BCI BreastCancerMStageVS ValueSet
title: BCI BreastCancerMStageVS ValueSet
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: Metastasis category according to AJCC breast cancer staging recommendations.

concept.display: No detectable metastatis by clinical or radiogical examination.
Cancer has spread to distant organs (most often to the bones, lungs, brain, or liver).
